message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. However, that price is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $90?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice. How about $95? That's a fair price.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $105 for the product. That's my final offer for now.
You drive a hard bargain, Alice! I'm willing to go up to $100, but that's really my limit.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $100, Bob. I'll take a closer look at my pricing and see if I can do better. I can offer it to you for $115.
